programme.title: The National Report
programme.desc: Join Scripps News journalists for fast-paced headlines and stories from across America.

programme.title: Free Spirit
programme.desc: Kate regains her faith in the classic Hurricane, talks history and equity in the cocktail industry, pledges allegiance to the French 75, and dives into a rich New Orleans cocktail culture thats much bigger than Bourbon Street.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.desc: Two serial killers whose chilling crimes left their communities devastated.

programme.title: Plate It!
programme.desc: You cant have Sacramento without the Kings, and you cant have the Kings without some seriously delicious grub. Chef Sara Arbabian is up against Chef Greg Desmangles to serve up an upscale take on their favorite courtside dishes.

programme.title: Chaos & Kindness
programme.desc: The team sets out on a Chaos and Kindness road trip, committing to doing good at every stop, with a very special musical guest joining them at the end.

programme.title: Blind Kitchen
programme.desc: In this battle, it's a clash of comfort food. Chef Pom Moongauklang of Pom Poms Sandwicheria & Tea House in The Milk District takes on Chef Nikki Akins of Nikkis Place in the Parramore District. Its Catfish versus Mackerel on Blind Kitchen.

programme.title: Celebrate New Mexico: Made Here
programme.desc: A look at the products and technological advances being made right now in New Mexico that are shaping our country and the world.

programme.title: KOAT Celebrates 70 Years
programme.desc: For 70 years KOAT has been part of your family. Youve let us into your homes, to bring you the news that matters most. In this special program, we bring back those familiar faces to revisit some of the biggest stories we have covered over 7 decades.

programme.title: Eat Play Stay
programme.desc: Visit a peachy brewery that uses local farm ingredients, then devour a massive biscuit sandwich. In Lexington, South Carolina you can have a close encounter with an exotic animal at a drive-thru safari before checking into an Italian villa in the heart of downtown.

programme.title: Bands of Enchantment
programme.desc: A high-voltage live set from Albuquerques Red Light Cameras delivers danceable garage-pop hooks and undeniable charisma. Fronted by Absolutely Albuquerque host Amanda Machon, this homegrown act brings the party to the high desert stage.

programme.title: Blind Kitchen
programme.desc: Florence born Chef Simone Montali, Academic Supervisor of the CSCA sets out to school Executive Chef Anthony Haley of Antonios Bacari in Hyde Park with his Tuscan flavors. Will Chef Simone prevail or will Chef Anthony have his own lesson to teach?

programme.title: Maker Nation Challenge
programme.desc: Three of Orlandos finest glass artists take on the challenge of creating an original design celebrating "The City Beautiful," but will a bird-brained twist push them to their melting point, and who will emerge victorious?

programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.desc: Heists that are so bold, brazen and audacious you have to see them to believe them. But in the world of crime, audacity doesnt always pay.

programme.title: Finding Adventure
programme.desc: Dr. Treva Brown holds a PhD in Chemistry, works for the US Naval Research Laboratory and is a pageant queen. This workaholic PhDiva cant make time for herself! Kinga wants to take Treva off the runway and into the outdoors.

programme.title: Stitch
programme.desc: Every day, regular people put in hard work to make their dreams come true whether it's a dream job, a dream adventure, or a dream to help others.

programme.title: Only In: Custom Car Artist, 14-Year-Old Soap Maker, & Quirky Gift Shop in Albuquerque, NM
programme.desc: Where can you find an extraordinary low-rider painter, a teenage entrepreneur with her own shop, and the city's quirkiest gifts and local art? The same place with an interactive breakfast burrito map and snowman without snow.

programme.title: The Lost Children of Carlisle
programme.desc: A powerful look at the history of Native American boarding schools as told through the stories of tribal members and their surviving family members, who endured an educational system founded on the concept Kill the Indian in him, and save the man.

programme.title: Target 7 Investigation: The Revolving Door
programme.desc: Target 7 takes an in-depth look at New Mexico's crime crisis and looks at possible solutions that could be used to address the state's crime problem.

programme.title: Underdog Uprising
programme.desc: Every game day, fans pour into the stands to cheer on New Mexico's soccer team. But these are no ordinary supporters. From the Curse, to Sektor 114, to the Black Diamonds these fans are making New Mexico United.

programme.title: Blind Kitchen
programme.desc: Patrick Shea, Chef and Owner of CK Pearl and Decklyns in Essex and Gloucester and Chef Kladji Plaku, Chef de Cuisine at City Table, City Barn & Solas in Boston engage in a battle of culinary skill. Will a surprise guest judge change everything?

programme.title: Unbelievable
programme.desc: Brace yourself for heart-stopping heroics as rescuers leap into action! A semi-truck teeters dangerously over the Ohio River, a devastating gas explosion reduces homes to rubble, and a capsized cargo ship leaves its crew fighting for survival.

programme.title: Eat Play Stay
programme.desc: Where else can you pilot your own catamaran before ordering up a slice of sushi pizza? If thats not enough, you can also spend the night in a cozy barn, enjoy a cocktail at Funky Monkey and savor the mystery at Magical Meat Boutique.

programme.title: Weathering the Storm
programme.desc: On December 10, 2021, a violent tornado outbreak hit western Kentucky. It was the deadliest weather event in the history of the Commonwealth. But as families faced a bleak holiday season, hope emerged in surprising ways.

programme.title: Finding Adventure
programme.desc: Daniel Johnson juggles three jobs and is a single father to three kids. Kinga meets with Daniel in Pittsburgh, PA to help him clock out, reconnect with nature, and experience some quality me time.

programme.title: Hit Me With Your Best Spot
programme.desc: From burlesque to roller skating to a Titanic museum, our local Orlando experts wont lead you astray. Weve got rock stars and drag queens who are passionate about The City Beautiful and know exactly which spots are worth your time.

programme.title: Lost Innocence: The Tragedy of Harmony Montgomery
programme.desc: A police investigation into a missing seven-year-old girl in Manchester, New Hampshire reveals harrowing details that shock the state. But even more disturbing is the discovery that the tragic outcome could have been avoided.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.desc: A Missouri community seeks answers when two young women disappear a decade apart

programme.title: Absolutely Albuquerque
programme.desc: MMA champion Michelle Waterson-Gomez takes Amanda on a high-energy day in Albuquerque. From throwing punches inside the octagon to dancing up high on aerial silks, this dynamic duo never seems to break a sweat.

programme.title: Stitch
programme.desc: Humans have been drawn to tales of hidden treasures, figurative and literal, for centuries. From prehistoric shark teeth to unmarked graves, to a field of irises with a clue to a lost community, each uncovered item has a history to be cherished.

programme.title: Hit Me With Your Best Spot
programme.desc: These local experts are passionate about Orlando. The Magics DJ D-Strong shares his go-to cocktail spot. Lindsay from Lemonhearted dishes on her favorite destination for vegan treats. And, Equity Ben shows you where to cool off.

programme.title: Ed & Day in The 'Burgh
programme.desc: Ed and Day explore the many sides of Lawrenceville. From sword fighting and thrifting to making wine and burgers, the guys experience the beauty of this eclectic neighborhood.

programme.title: The Spark
programme.desc: Dancer. Educator. Diplomat. Peacemaker. Aysha Upchurch is a force of nature. But its her gift for inspiring students that makes her the real star.

programme.title: Eat Play Stay
programme.desc: Stay the night in a historic haunted hotel. Climb aboard the region's only club experience on rails. Sip on an adult milkshake, and pay it forward with good barbecue.

programme.title: Boston Rob Does Beantown
programme.desc: Rob takes on ocean conservation and masters sculling, plus proves hes got the skills to perform on Bostons bluest stage with some world-famous performers.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.desc: A missing Milwaukee woman's family and her community push for answers about her disappearance. What authorities learn a week later sends shockwaves through the city.

programme.title: Stitch
programme.desc: We explore how entrepreneurs reduce waste, enhance recycling and transform reused materials into unique goods. These efforts craft a sustainable tomorrow.

programme.title: Chaos & Kindness
programme.desc: After the passing of their good friend and local superfan, Roy Small, the team finds ways to carry on his legacy. See how they bring the community together to celebrate his life.

programme.title: Boston Rob Does Beantown
programme.desc: Join Rob on an rugged outdoor adventure as he pushes himself to the limit from skydiving to ziplining in some of New Englands most scenic spots.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.desc: In a serene community, a beloved doctor is bludgeoned in her own home. Investigators uncover a conspiracy that rocks the close-knit neighborhood to its core.

programme.title: Target 7 Investigation: The Revolving Door
programme.desc: Target 7 takes an in-depth look at New Mexico's crime crisis and looks at possible solutions that could be used to address the state's crime problem.

programme.title: Bands of Enchantment
programme.desc: Alt-rock meets raw poetry in this fearless live set from Lauren Ruth Ward. With powerhouse vocals and a magnetic stage presence, she delivers gritty anthems and tender confessionals in equal measure... it's electric from start to finish.
